snippet: Mr. Trump’s suggestion that Ms. Kelly had questioned him forcefully at the Republican debate because she was menstruating cost him a speaking slot at an influential gathering.
abstract: Many Republican leaders seek to distance themselves from presidential hopeful Donald J Trump over untoward remarks he made about Fox News journalist Megyn Kelly, one of moderators of Republican presidential debate; some feel his attention-grabbing behavior is detrimental to party itself.

byline.original: By JONATHAN MARTIN and MAGGIE HABERMAN
byline.contributor: Trip Gabriel contributed reporting from Atlanta.

lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump’s suggestion that Ms. Kelly had questioned him forcefully at the Republican debate because she was menstruating cost him a speaking slot at an influential gathering.

headline.main: Hand-Wringing in G.O.P. After Donald Trump’s Remarks on Megyn Kelly
headline.print_headline: A Word Too Far? ‘Blood’ Remark Tests the G.O.P.
